description: This table contains hospital account CPT(R) codes from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of a hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Since multiple CPT� codes can be stored in one hospital account, each CPT� code will have a unique line number.

columns.name: CPT_CODE
columns.description: A CPT� code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: CPT_CODE_DATE
columns.description: A date associated with a CPT� code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: CPT_PERF_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID number of a performing provider associated with a CPT� code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: CPT_EVENT_NUMBER
columns.description: The event number associated with a CPT� code stored in the hospital account. Event number are used to associate CPT� codes with procedure codes.

columns.name: CPT_MODIFIERS
columns.description: A modifier or modifiers associated with a CPT� code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: LMRP_CODE
columns.description: A Local Medical Review Policy (LMRP) code associated with a CPT� code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: CPT_CODE_DESC
columns.description: The description of a CPT� code stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: PX_APC_FAC_RMB_AMT
columns.description: The monetary reimbursement amount for the procedure Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) FAC on the hospital account.

columns.name: PX_OCE_EDIT_CODE
columns.description: The procedure Outpatient Code Editor (OCE) edit code for the hospital account.

columns.name: PX_APC_CODE
columns.description: The procedure Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) code for the hospital account.

columns.name: PX_HCFA_PAYMT_AMT
columns.description: The procedure Health Care Payment and Remittance Advice (HCFA) monetary payment amount for the hospital account.

columns.name: PX_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: The monetary copay amount for the procedure on the hospital account.

columns.name: PX_REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the revenue code.

columns.name: PX_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: CPT_EXCLD_RPT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether to exclude CPT codes from clinical reporting. This is frequently used to filter out procedures copied over during an account merge to prevent double counting.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: CPT_QUANTITY
columns.description: Quantity of the CPT(R)/HCPCS code. Hospital accounts created prior to Epic 2014 have a null value in this column which implies a quantity of 1.

columns.name: CPT_POS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the Place of Service (POS) Type value for a coded CPT on an account..


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries:
